org.factcenter.qilin.primitives

Interface Cipher.PK<C,P,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - Ciphertext space
    P - Plaintext space
    R - Randomizer space
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cipher.SK<C,P,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ECElGamal.PK, ECElGamal.SK, ECPedersen, ECTrapdoorPedersen, ElGamal.PK, ElGamal.SK, PedersenCommitment, TrapdoorPedersenCommitment, ZpElGamal.PK, ZpElGamal.SK, ZpPedersen, ZpTrapdoorPedersen
    Enclosing interface:
    Cipher

    public static interface Cipher.PK<C,P,R>
    Represents the public key of a cipher. It allows encryption but not necessarily decryption.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C encrypt(P plaintext, R randomness)
      Encrypt the plaintext using randomness to randomize
      R getRandom(java.util.Random rand)
      Get a randomizer suitable for use with encrypt(Object, Object)
